name: NVSS
flux_or_mag_cut: S ≥ 15 mJy; |b|≥7°; plus bright-source and survey masks (see paper)
notes: x and α from Sec. 3.1; D_kin expectation reported as 0.41×10^-2 for β=1.23×10^-3.
z_notes: Shared radio z_mean=1 assumed (Protocol D-BAO v0 sensitivity scaffold).

name: RACS_low
flux_or_mag_cut: S ≥ 15 mJy; |b|≥7°; plus bright-source and survey masks (see paper)
notes: x and α from Sec. 3.2; D_kin expectation reported as 0.41×10^-2 for β=1.23×10^-3.
z_notes: Shared radio z_mean=1 assumed (Protocol D-BAO v0 sensitivity scaffold).

name: CatWISE_W1lt16p5
flux_or_mag_cut: W1 < 16.5 (≈0.078 mJy); |b|≥30°; plus Secrest et al. masks; ecliptic-latitude trend modelled
notes: x and α from Sec. 3.3; Table 1 includes ε=(9.2±0.4)×10^-4 for ecliptic-latitude trend.
z_notes: From Dam et al. 2022/2023 CatWISE quasar sample: mean z≈1.2; 99% z>0.1; 61% z>1 (selection differs slightly).

name: NVSS
flux_or_mag_cut: Same as baseline; additionally removes matches to 2MRS with z<0.02 (Table 1 note a)
notes: Table 1 'NVSSa'. Removes 4681 matches to 2MRS z<0.02 before flux cut.
z_notes: Shared radio z_mean=1 assumed (Protocol D-BAO v0 sensitivity scaffold).

name: RACS_low
flux_or_mag_cut: Same as baseline; additionally removes matches to 2MRS with z<0.02 (Table 1 note a)
notes: Table 1 'RACS-lowa'. Removes 4314 matches to 2MRS z<0.02 before flux cut.
z_notes: Shared radio z_mean=1 assumed (Protocol D-BAO v0 sensitivity scaffold).

name: CatWISE_W1lt16p5
flux_or_mag_cut: Same as baseline; 66 matches to 2MRS z<0.02 removed (paper notes negligible change)
notes: Not listed as separate 'a' row in Table 1; included here for convenience as change is negligible.
z_notes: From Dam et al. 2022/2023 CatWISE quasar sample: mean z≈1.2; 99% z>0.1; 61% z>1 (selection differs slightly).

name: Quaia_G20p5_z0p6_1p0
flux_or_mag_cut: G < 20.5; z∈[0.6,1.0); |b|≥30°; debias via provided random_10x
reference: Quaia dataset (Gaia–unWISE quasar catalogue); dipole computed here with random_10x debias
notes: sigma_dir from direction variation under |b| mask scan (20/25/30): 19.67°; D_obs_err combines shot-noise + mask-scan amplitude scatter.
z_notes: Mean redshift computed from redshift_quaia for objects in bin after |b|≥30° cut.
